Article Title: Taylor Swift sends baby gifts but ditches boyfriend Travis Kelce‚Äôs retreat‚Äîhas ‚ÄòAuntie Tay‚Äô replaced girlfriend Tay?
Article Text:
Taylor Swift's NFL bestie Chariah Gordon celebrates a big family milestone (Image via Instagram)

Chariah Gordon pulls out all the stops for daughter CiCi‚Äôs first birthday with love, style, and likely a smile from ‚ÄúAuntie Tay‚Äù

Taylor Swift has formed genuine friendships with several people in the NFL circle, and one of her closest bonds is with Chariah Gordon, the lively and stylish fianc√©e of wide receiver Mecole Hardman Jr. Their connection goes far beyond casual greetings from luxury box seats they‚Äôve truly shared memorable experiences together. From celebrating team victories and dancing at post-game parties to supporting each other during big moments and even live streaming events like the Super Bowl ring ceremony, their friendship has flourished both online and in real life.Recently, Chariah Gordon celebrated a heartwarming milestone that had her followers and likely Taylor Swift too smiling from afar. Her daughter, CiCi, just turned one, and Chariah marked the special day with a beautiful birthday celebration posted on Instagram. It was clear that a lot of love and effort went into making the day memorable for little CiCi, who looked every bit the star of the show in a series of adorable photos.‚ÄúAnd just like that, We have a 1 year old!!! Happy birthday to our baby girl Cici. Mommy & daddy loves you so much. You are literally the happiest baby, waking up to you and that beautiful big contagious smile every morning is the best feeling!!!‚ÄùThe birthday celebration for CiCi wasn't just about balloons and adorable outfits it carried a deeper, heartfelt message as well. In Chariah Gordon‚Äôs Instagram post, she included the powerful song ‚ÄúBrown Skin Girl‚Äù by Blue Ivy, a tribute to self-love, cultural pride, and confidence. The track added a meaningful touch to the celebration, reflecting not only CiCi‚Äôs blossoming personality but also Chariah‚Äôs desire to raise her daughter with strength and self-assurance.But it wasn‚Äôt just the beautiful tribute or the charming party setup that captured attention. Fans of Taylor Swift couldn‚Äôt help but notice the special bond between the pop star and Chariah. Chariah affectionately calls Taylor ‚ÄúAuntie Tay,‚Äù a nickname she‚Äôs proudly used in the past most memorably when she shared a photo of Taylor holding baby CiCi during a Chiefs game.CiCi was dressed in a variety of cute outfits, confidently posing like a tiny model, completely stealing the spotlight. Her birthday setup was equally charming a dreamy blend of pink, purple, and white balloons that gave the vibe of a mini Met Gala designed just for toddlers. The party d√©cor and the attention to detail reflected Chariah‚Äôs signature style, blending fun, elegance, and celebration perfectly.Though Taylor Swift wasn‚Äôt publicly seen at the event, fans believe she was likely cheering from a distance. Given how often she‚Äôs shown support for her NFL friends, it‚Äôs easy to imagine her sending warm wishes or a thoughtful gift behind the scenes. Taylor and Chariah‚Äôs friendship has grown over time, rooted in shared moments, mutual admiration, and the strong connection they‚Äôve built around their partners and the world of football.Chariah isn‚Äôt just known for her relationship with Mecole Hardman Jr. She‚Äôs also gained recognition as a supportive mom, a fashion-forward influencer, and a true game-day hype queen. Her energy, positivity, and style have made her a standout personality on and off the field. It‚Äôs no surprise she and Taylor, who values loyalty and strong female friendships, have bonded so well.Also Read: Breakup buzz explodes as Travis Kelce seen partying solo in Vegas while Taylor Swift vanishes from spotlight As CiCi celebrates her first birthday, Chariah‚Äôs post reminded everyone of the joy in life‚Äôs simple, sweet moments. Whether it‚Äôs on the sidelines of a game or during life‚Äôs personal milestones, this NFL circle continues to show that real friendships can grow in even the most high-profile settings full of fun, family, and heartfelt celebrations.
Article Summary: Taylor swift's nfl bestie chariah gordon celebrates a big family milestone. Gordon pulls out all the stops for daughter cici‚Äôs first birthday with love, style, and likely a smile from ‚Äúauntie tay‚Äô

Article Title: Shedeur Sanders' net worth 2025: How much money does the new Browns quarterback have?
Article Text:
Shedeur Sanders, once college football‚Äôs top NIL earner, risks stability for an uncertain NFL career after being drafted in the fifth round by the Browns. (Credit: Getty Images)

What is Shedeur Sanders' net worth?



As the 2025 NFL Draft unfolded, many eyes were glued to the screen for one reason ‚Äî Shedeur Sanders . The Colorado quarterback, known for his playmaking skills and magnetic persona, was expected to be an early pick. However, the draft night narrative took an unexpected twist. Sanders slid all the way to the 144th pick, where the Cleveland Browns finally took the leap.‚ÄúDraft time is not real time,‚Äù reflected veteran agent Leigh Steinberg. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs water-torture time. Every second seems like a minute. Every minute seems like an hour. Drip, drip, drip.‚ÄùFor Sanders, this wasn‚Äôt just about waiting ‚Äî it was about watching his payday shrink. Still, the dynamic quarterback enters the league not in his father's shadow, but blazing a path of his own, already among college football's top earners.Shedeur Sanders, son of NFL legend Deion Sanders, has had one of the most watched journeys in modern football. Once hailed as the face of the NIL revolution, Shedeur‚Äôs decision to go pro‚Äîdespite lucrative college opportunities‚Äîunderscores both the allure and risks of chasing an NFL dream.Sanders has a net worth of $4 million, according to Celebrity Net Worth . Born on February 7, 2002, and raised under the tutelage of his father, Shedeur developed into a standout quarterback at Trinity Christian School in Texas. A four-star recruit, he initially committed to Florida Atlantic University before pivoting to Jackson State when his father took over as head coach. There, he didn‚Äôt just thrive‚Äîhe dominated. Winning the Jerry Rice Award as the best freshman in FCS football, he quickly became one of college football‚Äôs most recognizable stars.His move to the University of Colorado only amplified his visibility. Though the Buffaloes had mixed results, Shedeur‚Äôs individual performance‚Äîmarked by accuracy, decision-making, and mobility‚Äîkept NFL scouts intrigued. Off the field, he was a marketing juggernaut. With endorsement deals from Gatorade, Beats by Dre, and Mercedes-Benz, and a social media following that rivaled pro athletes, his NIL earnings reportedly topped $5 million. ‚ÄúHe was the highest-paid NIL player in college sports,‚Äù noted various reports.But despite the potential to earn even more by staying in college‚Äîespecially as players like Carson Beck and Darian Mensah continued profiting from NIL‚ÄîShedeur entered the 2025 NFL Draft. Deion Sanders confidently declared his son a top-five pick, but doubts around Shedeur‚Äôs mechanics and leadership led to a surprising slide. The Cleveland Browns selected him in the fifth round, 144th overall.His rookie deal averages just over $1.16 million annually‚Äîwith no guaranteed money. And given the NFL‚Äôs harsh reality, where nearly half of fifth-rounders don‚Äôt make the roster, Shedeur‚Äôs professional path is filled with uncertainty.Still, with his pedigree, media appeal, and raw talent, Shedeur Sanders may yet prove that betting on oneself‚Äîdespite the odds‚Äîis the ultimate power move in today‚Äôs evolving football economy. NFL world will keep an sharp eye on him.Also Read: Is Shedeur Sanders making a financial sacrifice by entering the NFL instead of staying in college?
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders, son of nfl legend deion sanders, entered the 2025 nfl draft. He was selected by the cleveland browns in the fifth round, 144th overall. Sanders has a net worth of $4 million, according to celebrity net worth. His rookie deal averages over $1.16 million annually.

Article Title: Taylor Swift breaks silence on social media as Travis Kelce partied in Vegas with Jason Kelce and Justin Timberlake
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been together since 2023.(Image via Gotham/GC Images)

Taylor Swift finally breaks her social media silence as Travis Kelce enjoyed a trip to Las Vegas



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have chosen not to be spotted together by the media



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce might not have been spotted together in the recent few weeks, but they continue to enjoy their lives together and separately. In the last few days, the NFL star and the Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô tight end, Travis Kelce, was spotted in Las Vegas having the time of his life with popular actor and singer Justin Timberlake and Jason Kelce. While Taylor Swift remained away from the spotlight, she recently broke her social media silence.Yesterday, the billionaire pop star, Taylor Swift, broke her social media silence, but it was not for her friends or boyfriend, Travis Kelce. The pop sensation ‚Äúliked‚Äù a reel of three small boys who were excited to listen to Taylor Swift‚Äôs songs on their Alexa at home.The heartwarming video shows triplets jumping on the bed as their mother plays Taylor Swift‚Äôs songs on their Alexa. While the three small boys struggled to pronounce Taylor Swift‚Äôs name due to their young age, they thoroughly enjoyed her music.The caption for the heartwarming video reads as, ‚ÄúFound my triplets trying to get Alexa to play Taylor Swift‚Äù and the pop sensation‚Äôs reaction on it has sparked a frenzy among fans.A fan posted on X, ‚ÄúThey are the cutest!!!! Someone play them their Taylor Swift this instant üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠‚Äù, while another fan joked, ‚Äútaylor found it super cute that she forgot to change into her secret acc to like the video oh taylor u cant run away from us.‚ÄùA third fan commented, ‚ÄúThey don't even care what song it is, they just love it. This actually warms my heart <3‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúMOTHER IS ALIVE THANK GOD üôèüèº‚ÄùA fifth fan noted, ‚ÄúTaylor is alive and the future is secure with these mini swifties‚Äù, while another fan commented, ‚Äúshe is always on the internet spying usüò≠ü•∞‚ÄùWith Travis Kelce enjoying his day with the boys in Las Vegas, fans were pretty worried about his relationship with the pop star, Taylor Swift, but it seems like everything is fine between the two.A few days ago, as per People, a source said, ‚ÄúThey have been traveling nonstop and very much enjoy it. They are making the most of their time off together. They are hanging out with friends, too. It's a special time for them."Travis Kelce is back from his trip to Las Vegas, where he was spotted playing golf and enjoying a game of cards with his older brother, Jason Kelce and Justin Timberlake. With the upcoming season of the NFL beginning in a few months, fans are excited to see him back on the field.Also Read: "Joe would never‚Äù: Travis Kelce‚Äôs recent playful moment sparked debate as fans dragged Taylor Swift's ex Joe Alwyn into it
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce have been together since 2023. The nfl star and the kansas city chiefs‚Äô tight end was spotted in las vegas having the time of his life with justin timberlake and jason kelce. While taylor swift remained away from the spotlight, she recently broke her social media silence.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI have to start that process very soon‚Äù: WWE star Naomi planning to step back from WWE
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

Naomi decides to step back from WWE to focus on family planning

The Nikki & Brie Show

WrestleMania Weekend Part 2 with Naomi

Also Read

WWE superstar Naomi, who has recently become an overnight sensation after turning heel on WWE by attacking Jade Cargill, is planning to step back from the company for a very special and personal reason.Naomi has expressed her decision to step back and take a lengthy wrestling break to look after her personal life. She has focused on her professional life all her life, but this time it seems she wants to give her full time to her family.The WWE star was last seen against Jade Cargill at WrestleMania 41. During the match, Naomi displayed a heel-like aggression, but Jade turned the tide with powerful moves. Despite Naomi's impressive moves, Jade Cargill secured the victory.WWE star Naomi has decided to step back from WWE. However, the WWE star has been getting a ton of praise for the new heel character that she debuted after being revealed as Jade Cargill‚Äôs attacker.But Naomi has recently revealed that both she and her husband Jimmy Uso have been wanting to have children for a while, for which she will be going on a lengthy break from wrestling. Naomi opened up about her decision during an interview atin a conversation with The Bellas during WrestleMania 41 weekend in Las Vegas.During the interview, Naomi said, ‚ÄúI have to step away and, you know, take care of my health, take care of myself. And if we‚Äôre going to have kids, I have to start that process very soon, so with that on my mind, too, and on my plate, I think that makes, you know, my time left here even more special and valuable to me and that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm like, just so passionate about what I‚Äôm doing, because I really think this might be it.‚ÄùShe further added that Jimmy Uso and she are considering the decision because of her health issues. ‚ÄúI'm definitely leaning towards it, but I've had health issues. I only have one ovary. Even if I wanted to continue wrestling longer, my biological clock, I can't. We got a lot to figure out. I have to step away. And take care of my health and myself. If we're going to have kids, I have to start that process very soon,‚Äù Naomi said.Though Naomi has not revealed when she will take a break from WWE, but her next match is already being set up by WWE. With the Backlash Premium Live Event fast approaching, Naomi could be next seen in a rematch with her arch rival Jade Cargill soon.
Article Summary: Naomi has expressed her decision to step back and take a lengthy wrestling break. She has focused on her professional life all her life, but this time it seems she wants to give her full time to her family. Naomi has not revealed when she will take a break from wwe, but her next match is already being set up by wwe.

Article Title: Why Los Angeles Lakers GM Rob Pelinka could trade LeBron James for $186 million Milwaukee Bucks superstar
Article Text:
The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly considering trading LeBron James to the Milwaukee Bucks for Giannis Antetokounmpo. This bold move aims to pair Luka Donƒçiƒá with Giannis for long-term dominance, while the Bucks might acquire LeBron for marketing and future roster reset. Financial and contractual hurdles, including LeBron's player option, need to be addressed for the trade to materialize.

Los Angeles Lakers

general manager

Rob Pelinka

LeBron James

Giannis Antetokounmpo



Why the Los Angeles Lakers Might Consider Trading LeBron James for Giannis Antetokounmpo

"Rob Pelinka could decide to ignore any loyalty to LeBron and trade the 40-year-old star to the Bucks for Giannis Antetokounmpo, thereby creating a Luka-Giannis pairing that would be more potent than the current Luka-LeBron duo."

The Mechanics of a Potential Trade

LeBron James (Image Credit: Getty Images)

Key Factor



Details



LeBron‚Äôs Player Option



LeBron James holds a $52.6M option for 2025-26. If he opts in, he can veto any trade due to his no-trade clause.



New Contract Possibility



If LeBron signs a new deal without a no-trade clause, the Los Angeles Lakers could move him mid-season.



Salary Matching



A third team may be needed to balance salaries, as Giannis Antetokounmpo is owed $121.2M over the next two years.





Why the Bucks Might Entertain This Deal

has never been afraid of bold moves. After pulling off a blockbuster trade for Luka Donƒçiƒá earlier this year, he might be eyeing another franchise-altering deal‚Äîone that could seeshipped to the Milwaukee Bucks in exchange forWith a first-round exit looming, the Los Angeles Lakers' current season looks to be coming to a disappointing end. Rob Pelinka may choose to take a more aggressive tack, even though most people anticipate that the squad will retool around Donƒçiƒá and James. LeBron‚Äôs Age vs. Giannis‚Äô Prime: At 40, LeBron is still elite, but Giannis is 30 and in his peak years.- Long-Term Success: A Donƒçiƒá-Antetokounmpo duo could dominate the league for years.- Bucks‚Äô Desperation: With Damian Lillard‚Äôs Achilles injury, Milwaukee‚Äôs championship window may have closed, pushing Giannis Antetokounmpo toward a trade request.As Colin Keane of Sporting News noted in the original report:For this deal to happen, several financial and contractual hurdles must be cleared.While trading Giannis for an aging LeBron seems lopsided, Milwaukee‚Äôs situation is complicated.- Giannis‚Äô Trade Demand: If he requests a move, the Bucks lose leverage.- Marketing Boost: LeBron‚Äôs star power keeps Milwaukee relevant during a rebuild.- Future Planning: The Bucks may need to reset their roster for the 2030s.Rob Pelinka has a history of making unexpected moves, and this one would be his biggest yet. While trading LeBron James seems unthinkable, pairing Donƒçiƒá with Giannis Antetokounmpo could secure the Los Angeles Lakers ‚Äô future. Meanwhile, the Bucks might see value in acquiring a legend like LeBron James, even if only for a short-term boost.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could reel in $48 million Milwaukee Bucks star to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic in title push One thing is certain‚Äîif this trade happens, the NBA landscape will shift dramatically.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are reportedly considering trading lebron james to the milwaukee bucks for giannis antetokounmpo. This bold move aims to pair luka donƒçiƒá with giannis for long-term dominance. Financial and contractual hurdles, including lebron's player option, must be addressed for the trade to materialize.

Article Title: Skylar Diggins confirms removing her husband‚Äôs name as she embraces a new chapter with Seattle Storm
Article Text:
Skylar Diggins. Image via: Leon Bennett/ Getty Images

Skylar Diggins clarified her name to the media



Seattle Storm point guard Skylar Diggins has officially dropped her husband's name ‚ÄúSmith‚Äù from hers whom she married in 2017, choosing to be publicly known simply as Skylar Diggins moving forward. The WNBA player confirms the change during the team‚Äôs media day ahead of the 2025 season, putting an end to the speculations that have been swirling online in recent weeks after the fans began noticing the change in her social media handles.Diggins, who rose to national visibility during her college years at Notre Dame, has long been one of the most recognizable faces in women‚Äôs basketball. She tied the knot with former Fighting Irish footballer Daniel Smith in April 2017, the couple has two children together and managed to maintain a relatively private life.Skylar Diggins recently changed her social media handles, removing ‚ÄúSmith‚Äù from her name, causing speculations of a drift in the relationship. When asked directly about the change, Diggins responded confidently and with a smile, while making it clear that the decision was hers and hers alone. ‚ÄúYes. Thank you for the question, too, yes, it does say Skylar Diggins, and I would like to be addressed as that moving forward,‚Äù she said.While Diggins hasn‚Äôt officially offered a detailed explanation for the change, fans were quick to notice that she had not only updated her social media handles and bio but also removed several photos with her husband, Daniel Smith. The move led to plenty of speculation, but no official word about her personal life has been shared.Beyond the headlines about her name, Diggins looked genuinely excited about the upcoming season. The Storm have undergone some major transformations, including the trade of longtime after Jewell Loyd. In return, Seattle secured the No.2 overall pick in the 2025 draft, adding future potential to the team.Diggins mentioned,‚Äù This is definitely the most talented roster I‚Äôve been a part of in my 13 years, 11 on the floor,‚Äù adding, ‚ÄúEverybody looks really good, the vibes have been really good.‚ÄùSkylar Diggins enters the 2025 WNBA season ready to turn the page and lead by example both on and off the court.Also Read: ‚ÄúYou make us proud‚Äù ‚Äî Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs wife Mariah Antetokounmpo poured heartfelt tribute after Milwaukee Bucks‚Äô series loss
Article Summary: Seattle storm point guard skylar diggins has officially dropped her husband's name ‚Äúsmith‚Äù from hers. The wnba player confirms the change during the team‚Äôs media day ahead of the 2025 season. Diggins rose to national visibility during her college years at notre dame. She tied the knot with former fighting irish footballer daniel smith in april 2017.

Article Title: Tua Tagovailoa‚Äôs future in Miami crumbles as Dolphins make shocking quarterback move
Article Text:
Tua Tagovailoa‚Äôs future in Miami crumbles (Getty Images)

Dolphins‚Äô new quarterback choice signals a bold shift in long-term strategy



Tua Tagovailoa‚Äôs journey highlights the balance between resilience and risk



Backup quarterback‚Äôs seven-figure loss reflects deeper emotional stakes

The Miami Dolphins have sparked major conversation across the NFL landscape after drafting a new quarterback from the Texas Longhorns, a move signaling potential change at the most critical position. As a result, current starter Tua Tagovailoa finds himself navigating a wave of uncertainty, with both emotional and financial consequences rippling through the team.In an unexpected but calculated move, the Miami Dolphins' front office made it clear they are thinking beyond the present by investing in a young quarterback prospect. This decision doesn‚Äôt just add competition‚Äîit signals the beginning of a strategic transition. With fresh talent entering the locker room, the message is unmistakable: the franchise is determined to secure its future, even if it means re-evaluating relationships with established stars like Tagovailoa.Tua Tagovailoa‚Äôs career with the Dolphins has been a testament to both brilliance and adversity. After battling through a series of injuries, especially concussions, Tagovailoa showed resilience time and again. Yet, the physical toll of the game has never been far from mind for both the player and the organization. The recent draft move forces a tough reality into focus‚Äîbalancing loyalty to a battle-tested leader with the practical need to protect the team‚Äôs long-term viability.Adding to the drama, the team‚Äôs backup quarterback reportedly suffered a jaw-dropping seven-figure financial loss in the wake of the draft move. This sudden hit is not just about dollars‚Äîit captures the often harsh business side of professional sports, where roles and futures can pivot overnight. It also underscores the emotional challenges athletes face when roster decisions upend carefully laid career plans.In steering the team through this delicate phase, head coach Mike McDaniel has approached the situation with measured precision and deep empathy. Recognizing the strong bonds that have formed within the team, McDaniel‚Äôs handling of the quarterback competition aims to blend tactical necessity with human understanding. The Dolphins' leadership knows that while performance metrics matter, preserving team culture is equally vital during times of change.Also Read: Mike Tomlin's cryptic comments on Aaron Rodgers fuel rumors of a Steelers move‚ÄîIs Pittsburgh desperate for a QB? As the Miami Dolphins navigate this pivotal moment, they stand at a crossroads that could redefine their future. For Tagovailoa, the challenge will be to reaffirm his place as the team‚Äôs leader, while the newly drafted quarterback prepares to make his case. In professional sports, change is inevitable, but with change comes opportunity‚Äîfor reflection, growth, and ultimately, renewed success.
Article Summary: The miami dolphins have sparked major conversation after drafting a new quarterback from the texas longhorns. As a result, current starter tua tagovailoa finds himself navigating a wave of uncertainty. The team‚Äôs backup quarterback reportedly suffered a seven-figure financial loss in the wake of the draft.

Article Title: Watch: What happened after Kuldeep Yadav slapped Rinku Singh on the field
Article Text:
Kuldeep Yadav's friendly slap to Rinku Singh (Screengrab)

Poll What do you think is the key to KKR's recent success? Effective strategies and leadership in crucial moments Strong team performance and contributions from key players

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Everything is special about Vaibhav Suryavanshi: Vikram Rathour

NEW DELHI: Cricket fans were caught off guard after a playful moment between Kuldeep Yadav and Rinku Singh went viral following the intense IPL clash between Delhi Capitals and Kolkata Knight Riders at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Tuesday.In a clip, Kuldeep was seen giving Rinku a friendly slap during the post-match greetings.While it may have sparked curiosity online, the gesture was clearly in jest.The video that followed put any doubts to rest, showing the duo sharing laughs, making the ‚ÄòL‚Äô sign ‚Äî symbolising ‚ÄòLove‚Äô ‚Äî and enjoying warm off-field camaraderie.Watch:Both Kuldeep and Rinku hail from Uttar Pradesh and share a strong bond off the field, often engaging in friendly banter.Also See: PBKS vs CSK IPL Live Score The video not only captured their humorous moment on the ground but also featured glimpses of their fun interactions behind the scenes.As for the match itself, KKR secured a thrilling 14-run win over DC, keeping their playoff hopes alive. Batting first, KKR posted a solid 204/9, with crucial contributions from Angkrish Raghuvanshi (44), Rinku Singh (36), and Andre Russell‚Äôs late fireworks.Rinku had earlier taken on Kuldeep Yadav in style, hammering two fours and a six in a single over.In reply, DC managed 190/9, despite fighting knocks from Faf du Plessis (62), Axar Patel (43), and Vipraj Nigam (38). Sunil Narine was the pick of the bowlers for KKR with 3/29, while Mitchell Starc delivered a dramatic final over, claiming two wickets and sealing the win.With this victory, KKR moved to 9 points, still in the playoff race, while DC held onto a top-four spot with 12 points.
Article Summary: Kuldeep yadav's friendly slap to rinku singh goes viral. The gesture was clearly in jest. Kkr secured a thrilling 14-run win over dc, keeping their playoff hopes alive. The video not only captured their humorous moment on the ground but also featured glimpses of their fun interactions behind the scenes.

Article Title: 'People add very little value to your emotions': R Ashwin opens up on retirement call
Article Text:
Ravichandran Ashwin

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll What do you admire most about R. Ashwin's career? His mental toughness and ability to perform under pressure His exceptional spin bowling and wicket-taking ability

We will try to make a comeback and finish in top-two: Vipraj Nigam

Former Indian off-spinner R Ashwin revealed he contemplated retirement after his 100th Test but made the final decision during the Australia tour when he wasn't selected for the Perth Test, with Washington Sundar playing instead. Ashwin, who retired at the Gabba after the third Test against Australia, shared these details during a new podcast by Chennai Super Kings with Mike Hussey.Ashwin played his final Test match at the Gabba after featuring in the second Test at Adelaide. He had been left out of the playing eleven for the third Test where he announced his retirement.The 38-year-old spinner, who is currently playing for Chennai Super Kings, finished his Test career as India's second-highest wicket-taker with 537 scalps."To be very honest, I wanted to do it after my 100th Test. And then I thought, Ok, let me give it a go in the home season. Because, I mean, you're playing well, and you're getting wickets, you're making runs," Ashwin said."I thought I'd probably close off with the Chennai Test here. I ended up getting a six-wicket haul and a hundred. So it's very tough to quit when you're doing very well," he added."So, I went on with the series, and we lost against New Zealand. So, one after the other, it was just building up. And then I thought, okay, let me go to Australia. Let me see how this goes. Because the last time I was in Australia, I had a great, great tour."Family time was becoming a significant factor in his decision to retire. The physical and mental demands of the game were taking their toll.Quiz: Who's that IPL player? "I thought it does make sense to play a bit. I was having a lot of fun, but the whole hard yards that I had to put through to put myself in the park again, physically and mentally, one of the most important things that was pulling me down was the family time," he explained.His non-selection in Perth ultimately influenced his decision to retire. "And when I didn't start in Perth, it was like, okay, this whole circle keeps going again. People add very little value to what you're going through emotionally," Ashwin said."They don't really consider that because your emotions are yours, and it doesn't matter to anybody else. So I had been contemplating that, and then I thought, okay, maybe it is time."
Article Summary: Ravichandran ashwin played his final test match at the gabba. The 38-year-old spinner was left out of the playing eleven for the third test. He finished his test career as india's second-highest wicket-taker with 537.

A lot of drama surrounded Milwaukee Bucks standout Giannis Antetokounmpo as he and his team faced a devastating series loss against the Indiana Pacers after a game 5 defeat. On top of that he had a huge clash with Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs dad which stole the spotlight. However, the two-time MVP had a sigh of relief as his wife Mariah Antetokounmpo stood by his side pouring in a heartfelt message for her husband in his tough time.Family matters. In Milwaukee Bucks‚Äô narrow and heartbreaking 119-118 Game 5 loss against the Indiana Pacers, Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs wife Mariah Antetokounmpo made a beautiful gesture for her husband showing that his family is standing with him.Taking to her Instagram Mariah shared a series of photographs of her with their three kids alongside several candid snaps of Giannis as she celebrated love and family bond. To‚ÄúMy Husband, Look at this life you created! We love you To My Husband, Look at this life you created! We love you ŒºœÄŒ±ŒºœÄŒ¨œÇ. You make us proud every single day. You make us proud every single day,‚Äù she captioned.For context, ŒºœÄŒ±ŒºœÄŒ¨œÇ which is pronounced bamp√°s, translates to "dad" or "father" (via Google). With the word she asserted that Giannis has been a wonderful father to their three children‚Äî Liam, Maverick and Eva.It is no secret that Giannis had a rough night. While losing the playoff series was heartbreaking for him, he was seen quite frustrated after Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs dad teased him on courtside sparking a huge headline grabber altercation.In a hard-fought game, Giannis delivered a stellar performance for the Milwaukee Bucks, nearly willing his team to victory. The forward logged an exhausting 44 minutes and 14 seconds on the floor, putting up 30 points on an efficient 52.9% shooting from the field. He also knocked down one of his two three-point attempts and went 11-for-17 from the free-throw line.Also Read: What happened between Giannis Antetokounmpo and Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs father? Milwaukee Bucks vs Indiana Pacers courtside confrontation explained Beyond his scoring, Giannis was a force on the glass and a playmaker. He grabbed a dominant 20 rebounds, 18 of them on the defensive end, and dished out 13 assists, recording a triple-double. He also added 2 steals and 2 blocks, showing his all-around impact. However, his 7 turnovers and 5 personal fouls were costly in a tightly contested matchup.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo and milwaukee bucks lost 119-118 to the indiana pacers. His wife mariah posted a heartfelt message for her husband on instagram. Giannis was seen quite frustrated after tyrese haliburton‚Äôs dad teased him on courtside.

Article Title: John Lynch's backs Shedeur Sanders, emphasizing why draft position doesn't define success : ‚ÄúHe's a competitor‚Äù
Article Text:
49ers John Lynch supports Shedeur Sanders with strong message (Image via: Getty Images)

John Lynch‚Äôs lesson to Shedeur Sanders Lynch shows empathy for Shedeur Sanders In the high-stakes world of the NFL Draft, where hype often overshadows talent, one quarterback is proving that where you're picked doesn‚Äôt always determine your future. Brock Purdy , selected as the final pick of the 2022 NFL Draft, is shattering expectations. Now, as he leads the San Francisco 49ers to Super Bowl glory and two NFC Championship appearances, the team is looking to extend his contract. His rise to NFL stardom is a powerful lesson for Shedeur Sanders , who faced an unexpected slide in the 2023 draft.Shedeur Sanders , known for his stellar college career and impressive stats, leading the Big 12 in passing yards, touchdowns, and completion percentage was widely expected to be one of the top quarterbacks selected in the 2023 NFL Draft. Instead, he found himself dropping to the fifth round, a surprising fall that left many scratching their heads. Despite his college success, the Cleveland Browns passed on him twice in the second round before selecting him in the fifth.In the wake of Sanders' draft slide, John Lynch, the 49ers' general manager, stepped forward with a message of encouragement. Reflecting on the unexpected success of Brock Purdy, Lynch reminded everyone that a player‚Äôs draft position doesn't define their potential. "It‚Äôs not when you go, it‚Äôs not where you go, it‚Äôs what you do with that opportunity," Lynch shared in a post-draft press conference. Purdy‚Äôs journey from being overlooked by 31 teams to leading the 49ers to the brink of a Super Bowl‚Äîproves that success is built on the right mindset and seizing opportunities, no matter when or where they come.Lynch showed empathy for Sanders, acknowledging the emotional toll of the draft process. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs tough for a young man, but I know that he's a competitor.‚Äù Lynch said, recognizing the pressure and disappointment Sanders likely faced. But he also emphasized Sanders' competitive nature, expressing confidence that the quarterback now has the chance to prove his worth with the Cleveland Browns.Much like Purdy, Sanders now has a golden opportunity to prove his doubters wrong. While his fall in the draft may have been a blow to his pride, it also positions him to make a statement and potentially redefine his career. This is the moment where he can transform his narrative from an overlooked prospect to a standout NFL star.Also Read: ‚ÄúHow Much Time Do You Have?‚Äù Jalen Milroe‚Äôs honest yet witty reply on where he needs to improve As Lynch reminded everyone, the real question isn‚Äôt about when or where you‚Äôre drafted, but what you do once you get the chance. And now, the ball is in Sanders' court. Can he rise above the doubt and take his career to new heights, just like Brock Purdy did? Only time will tell, but if his competitive spirit matches his talent, he might just become the next success story the NFL never saw coming.
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders was widely expected to be one of the top quarterbacks selected in the 2023 nfl draft. Instead, he found himself dropping to the fifth round, a surprising fall that left many scratching their heads. The cleveland browns passed on him twice in the second round before selecting him in the fifth.

Article Text:

What are NYT Strands and how to play the game?



Tips for solving NYT Strands puzzle



The New York Times published its inaugural crossword puzzle on February 15, 1942, in the Sunday Magazine. Created by Charles Erlenkotter and edited by Margaret Farrar, it was the first major newspaper to feature a crossword puzzle. Over the years, the NYT has introduced several beloved games, including the Mini Crossword in 2014, followed by Spelling Bee, Letter Boxed, and Tiles. In 2022, the NYT launched the wildly popular Wordle, followed by additional games like Connections and Strands.NYT Strands is the latest addition to its puzzle offerings. This engaging daily game presents players with new themes each day, challenging them to uncover all the words on the grid. One of the game‚Äôs highlights is the special Spangram, which stretches across two sides of the board. With its innovative approach to word puzzles, Strands quickly became a fan favorite, adding to the diverse and exciting puzzle lineup of the New York Times.Having trouble solving today‚Äôs NYT Strands puzzle ? We‚Äôre here to help with some easy hints to fuel your curiosity even more. Plus, we‚Äôve got today‚Äôs answer waiting for you ‚Äì just keep reading.Below, we‚Äôve shared the hints, answers, and Spangram for today‚Äôs NYT Strands puzzle. The hints may give away part or all of the Strands, so proceed with caution. Scroll down to continue:is the Spangram for today‚Äôs NYT Strands puzzle.Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of Connections, Spelling Bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. The goal is to solve the Spangram and uncover all the theme-related words.To play, connect letters on the grid to form words by dragging your mouse or fingers (on a touchscreen) in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal directions.Start by identifying the central theme word or Spangram, which will help you understand the puzzle‚Äôs theme.In addition to the Spangram, you must also find other words related to the theme hidden in the grid. Once you‚Äôve uncovered them all, the puzzle is complete.Identify the theme words: Fill in the grid with the theme words. Once found, they will be highlighted in blue and won't overlap with each other.Find the Spangram: Identify the Spangram, a key part of the puzzle that connects two opposite sides of the grid. It encapsulates the theme and may consist of two words. The Spangram will be highlighted in yellow once you‚Äôve located it.Take advantage of hints: Pay attention to off-topic words for clues. For every three non-theme words you uncover, letters will be highlighted to give you a hint toward finding a theme word, without directly revealing it.
Article Summary: Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of connections, spelling bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. To play, connect letters on the grid to form words by dragging your mouse or fingers (on a touchscreen) in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal directions.

Article Title: RJ Mahvash‚Äôs viral reaction on Yuzvendra Chahal‚Äôs hat-trick - 'God mode on'
Article Text:
Yuzvendra Chahal and RJ Mahvash

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

A Father's Pride: How RR, Dravid & Vikram Shaped Vaibhav Suryavanshi

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings spinner Yuzvendra Chahal sent cricket fans into a frenzy on Wednesday night with a jaw-dropping hat-trick against Chennai Super Kings (CSK), and among the many reacting to his heroics was RJ Mahvash, who posted a now-viral tribute on social media: ‚ÄúGod mode on kya? Yuzvendra Chahal strength of a warrior sir.‚ÄùThe comment, shared on Instagram, quickly gained attention ‚Äî not only for the praise it heaped on Chahal, but also because of ongoing dating rumours linking the RJ and the star spinner.The post added fuel to fan curiosity while celebrating one of the greatest bowling displays of IPL 2025 so far.Playing for Punjab Kings, Chahal turned the tide in the 19th over of the CSK innings at Chepauk.With CSK cruising at 177 for 5 and looking to finish strong, the leg-spinner struck gold, removing MS Dhoni , Deepak Hooda, Anshul Kamboj, and Noor Ahmad in the space of just six balls.He finished with incredible figures of 4 for 32 in just three overs.Dhoni, who had just hit Chahal for a six, was caught trying to clear long-off.Hooda and Kamboj followed in quick succession, both falling cheaply.Chahal sealed his hat-trick with the wicket of Noor Ahmad, joining an elite list of bowlers to take four wickets in a single IPL over.This was Chahal‚Äôs second IPL hat-trick and a record-breaking ninth instance of him claiming four or more wickets in an innings, the most in league history.The performance stunned CSK and tilted the momentum completely in Punjab‚Äôs favour.
Article Summary: Punjab kings spinner yuzvendra chahal took a hat-trick against chennai super kings. The leg-spinner removed ms dhoni, deepak hooda, anshul kamboj, and noor ahmad in the space of just six balls. He finished with incredible figures of 4 for 32 in just three overs. Rj mahvash posted a now-viral tribute on social media.

Article Title: ‚ÄúBetter be banned‚Äù ‚Äì Fans call for Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs father to be banned from the NBA after courtside altercation with Giannis Antetokounmpo
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton and his father and Giannis Antetokounmpo. Image via: Ron Hoskins/NBAE/Getty | Stacy Revere/ Getty Images

Giannis Antetokounmpo and Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs father‚Äôs altercation stole the spotlight at Gainbridge Fieldhouse



Fans reacted to Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs confrontation with Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs father

The Indiana Pacers edged out a dramatic 119-118 overtime victory against the Milwaukee Bucks . While Tyrese Haliburton 's game-winning shot over Giannis Antetokounmpo lit up Gainbridge Fieldhouse, the postgame headlines were stolen by a courtside altercation between Giannis and Haliburton's father, John. Fans online are not happy with John‚Äôs move, as many are asking the NBA to ban him from the playoffs.Giannis Antetokounmpo was making his way off the court when John Haliburton approached him, waving a towel with his son's face on it and allegedly yelling, ‚ÄúThis is what we do.‚Äù The bold move did not sit well with the two-time MVP, who interpreted the act as a blatant show of disrespect. Giannis responded, and the two ended up in a tense face-to-face standoff that required players and staff from both benches to intervene.Giannis later addressed the confrontation: ‚ÄúI believe in being humble in victory. That‚Äôs who I am,‚Äù he said in his postgame comments. ‚ÄúSome people will say when you win the game, you can talk s___ and say it‚Äôs a green light for you to be disrespectful. I disagree. I‚Äôve won a championship, they haven‚Äôt.‚ÄùThe Bucks star added, ‚ÄúI feel like that‚Äôs very, very disrespectful.‚ÄùTyrese Haliburton didn‚Äôt shy away from the issue either. Addressing the incident in his postgame press conference, he took accountability for his father‚Äôs actions. ‚ÄúAs far as the incident between Giannis and my pops, I had no idea until I got to the back and was shown the video. I don‚Äôt agree with what transpired... I don‚Äôt think that my pops was in the right at all there.‚ÄùFans online quickly shared their thoughts on the matter. Many demand a ban on John Haliburton from the NBA games as a form of punishment.‚ÄúBetter be banned for the rest of the playoffs for this dumb s*it,‚Äù one fan wrote on X.‚ÄúFather should be banned for rest of playoffs,‚Äù another echoed the same.‚ÄúFather a bad example of sportsmanship,‚Äù another wrote.‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad i saw this angle cause Hali dad was deff in the wrong for taunting Giannis after a big loss like that,‚Äù another shared.‚ÄúWhat a clown,‚Äù one fan condemned the action of John.‚ÄúWhy is he seeking out a 7 foot Greek god like that. Super inappropriate and stupid,‚Äù another wrote.Also Read: What happened between Giannis Antetokounmpo and Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs father? Milwaukee Bucks vs Indiana Pacers courtside confrontation explained Despite the off-court fireworks, Giannis delivered a dominant triple-double performance with 30 points, 20 rebounds, and 13 assists. But it was Haliburton‚Äôs clutch shot and his father's postgame antics that have now become the talk of NBA fans.
Article Summary: The indiana pacers edged out a dramatic 119-118 overtime victory against the milwaukee bucks. Giannis antetokounmpo was making his way off the court when john haliburton approached him, waving a towel with his son's face on it. The bold move did not sit well with the two-time mvp, who interpreted the act as a blatant show of disrespect.

Article Title: Ben Roethlisberger: ‚ÄúHis Sister Suck My D***‚Äù : Antonio Brown reignites beef with Ben Roethlisberger in an ugly tweet about 2011 Pro Bowl incident

Antonio Brown's explosive tweet: The shocking claim about Ben Roethlisberger‚Äôs sister during the 2011 Pro Bowl

The timing of Brown‚Äôs recent claim about hooking up with Roethlisberger‚Äôs sister at the 2011 Pro Bowl seems intentional, as it reignites the long-standing rivalry and shifts focus back onto their personal issues.This revelation, while evil, doesn‚Äôt just add another chapter to the Brown-Roethlisberger saga, it also raises questions about how we view the legacies of both players. Article Title: PBKS skipper Shreyas Iyer breaks silence as injury rules Glenn Maxwell out of IPL 2025
Article Text:
Glenn Maxwell (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

A Father's Pride: How RR, Dravid & Vikram Shaped Vaibhav Suryavanshi

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings (PBKS) have suffered a major blow ahead of their crucial IPL 2025 clash against Chennai Super Kings , as star Australian all-rounder Glenn Maxwell has been ruled out of the remainder of the tournament due to a fractured finger.PBKS skipper Shreyas Iyer confirmed the news at the toss on Wednesday, saying, ‚ÄúUnfortunate that he's got a fractured finger. Haven‚Äôt decided on a replacement so far.‚ÄùMaxwell, bought for a hefty Rs 4.2 crore, has had a disappointing season with the bat, scoring just 48 runs in seven matches at an average of 8.00.While he managed to pick up four wickets, his overall performance fell well short of expectations, and his absence now leaves a significant hole in the PBKS middle order.PBKS will still back themselves to perform at Chepauk, coming into the match with five wins from nine games and sitting fifth on the table.With the playoffs in sight, they‚Äôll look to cement their position with a win against a struggling CSK.For Chennai, this is a do-or-die clash. Languishing at the bottom of the table with just two wins in nine matches, the Super Kings are desperate to reignite their campaign.Despite the return of MS Dhoni as captain after Ruturaj Gaikwad‚Äôs injury, CSK have failed to turn things around. Poor form from senior players like Ravindra Jadeja, Rachin Ravindra, and Matheesha Pathirana has hurt their chances badly.However, CSK have found hope in young Ayush Mhatre, who impressed on debut and will again be key against PBKS‚Äôs potent bowling attack, especially in the powerplay against Arshdeep Singh.The duel between Shivam Dube and Yuzvendra Chahal in the middle overs could also prove decisive.With both teams having everything to play for, fans can expect a high-stakes showdown tonight in Chennai.
Article Summary: Glenn maxwell ruled out of remainder of ipl with fractured finger. Punjab kings (pbks) face chennai super kings (csk) at chepauk on wednesday. Pbks are fifth in the table, while csk are bottom of the table.
